articles.author: A Ksheerasagar
articles.title: How does Indian market stack up against Asian peers when it comes to recent correction? | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Over the past four trading sessions, both the Nifty and Sensex witnessed a nearly 2% decline, a trend that mirrors the performance of their Asian counterparts. South Korea's Kospi experienced a drop of 2.42% in last four trading sessions, while Taiex shed 1.6…
articles.content: As financial markets around the world experienced notable shifts in recent trading sessions, India's Nifty 50 and Sensex were not exempt from the heightened volatility. A combination of weak Q3 earni… [+4475 chars]
